fields.name: Alignment:
fields.value:
Rebel Investigative
**Attack**
None
**Defense**
None
**Abilities:**
- Hitch with a player at night.
**Attributes:**
- With the Rebel Flag, you can take gunpoint and hitchhike at the same time.
- You know the role (Investigator results) of your target, as well as the name and role (Investigator results) of who they visit.
- Being risen by a Retributionist, Necromancer, or Archivist will perform the ability as normal.
**Goal:**
Kill all who oppose the Rebellion.
